long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Timedrift transforms your new tab experience with a beautifully designed interface tailored to your needs.

Features:
	•	Time Zone Management: Add, view, and manage different time zones.
	•	Time Conversion: Quickly convert time across multiple time zones.
	•	Visual Cues: Unique design elements to help you feel time differently.
	•	Theming Options: Customize the appearance of your new tab page with light, dark, or system theme support.

Timedrift is designed to reduce distractions while providing a functional and elegant way to manage time.
